caption.text:
Montenegro Milk Punch
.
This is a great amaro Montenegro cocktail created by the one and only @apartment_bartender, And the weather here is dropping so why not keep the holiday cocktails coming! 
___________
•1oz @amaromonte •1/2oz Cognac
•2oz Unsweetened Almond Milk
•1/2oz Demerara Simple
•1 Dash of Chocolate Bitter
.
Shake and strain all ingredients in rocks filled glass and grate nutmeg over cocktail. Cheers!
#stircrazycocktails .
.
